professionalExperience.title: Product Engineer
responsibilities: Worked as a full stack Java developer
Utilized advanced Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and SQL technologies
Handled all VAPT (Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing) issues for my project
Assisted in delivery of the project
Contributed to AI by developing a presales agent which can create RFP excels using crewAI

internships.title: Cybersecurity Intern
responsibilities: Configured and maintained SIEM solutions for log analysis and threat detection
Performed basic malware analysis using sandbox environments
Assisted in penetration testing of internal applications
Documented security vulnerabilities and recommended remediation steps
